steps.name: Make Levain
steps.description: Mix levain ingredients and let ripen for 10 hours

steps.name: Autolyse
steps.description: Mix flour, water, and levain - let rest 20 minutes

steps.name: Mix & Bulk Fermentation
steps.description: Finish mixing and begin bulk fermentation

steps.name: Final Shape & Proof
steps.description: Shape and place into the refrigerator to proof overnight

steps.name: Bake
steps.description: Bake the next day before work
